about_the_game:
Dive into a chilling sci-fi horror where the ocean's deepest trench becomes your prison, and the abyss itself watches your every move.

A Thrilling Descent into the Unknown:

You are a marine biologist, handpicked for a prestigious research project in the Mariana Trench. Your mission: spend two months on a cutting-edge underwater base, collecting and analyzing the unique life forms that thrive in this unexplored realm. The activation of a powerful neutrino observatory promises groundbreaking discoveries, pushing the boundaries of human understanding.

But something lurks in the depths.

Communication with the surface becomes strained, your curator's reassurances turning into cryptic warnings. A haunting realization dawns upon you: previous expeditions met a grim end in these depths. Their two-month missions became their tombs. Now, you must uncover the truth behind their fate before the abyss claims you too.

Unravel the Secrets of the Deep:

  • Explore a haunting underwater base: Navigate claustrophobic corridors, investigate abandoned labs, and uncover the chilling secrets of the past expeditions. What happened here?

  • Collect and analyze unique specimens: Utilize advanced scientific tools to study the fascinating – and sometimes terrifying – life forms that call the abyss home. Will your discoveries hold the key to survival?

  • Interact with the neutrino observatory: Monitor its readings, analyze its data, and uncover a potential connection between its operation and the base's dark history.

  • Solve challenging puzzles and overcome perilous obstacles: Can you escape this underwater trap and expose the sinister forces that want you silenced?

  • Experience a truly immersive sci-fi horror: The crushing pressure, the isolating darkness, the paranoia – the abyss will test your sanity. Will you succumb to its gaze, or will you fight to survive?

Abyss stares at you is a gripping psychological thriller that will challenge your mind and test your courage. Dare to descend into the unknown?

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for Vulkan 1.2

  • Processor: 3Ghz

name: Abyss Stares at You
short_description: Trapped in an underwater base at the bottom of the Mariana Trench, you uncover a chilling truth: previous expeditions never returned. Solve the mystery, survive the abyss, and escape before it claims you too. A sci-fi horror where the depths hold more than just darkness.
